DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate whether a particular form of migraine, migraine with aura, is associated with structural changes in the brain
DOC.brief_title: Women With Migraine With Aura Neuroimaging Study
DOC.criteria: female case (migraine with aura), cotwin to case, or control (migrainefree) residency in Denmark no severe neurological (vascular, neurodegenerative or neuroinflammatory) disorders, or other somatic or psychiatric disorders male residency outside Denmark registered in Civil Registry as not to be contacted by researchers severe neurological (vascular, neurodegenerative or neuroinflammatory) disorders, or other somatic or psychiatric disorders mobile metal parts or other contraindication for MRI weight of 130+ kilograms pregnancy subjects that wished not to be informed about abnormal findings on MRI chronic tensiontype headache, medication overuse headache, or cluster headache (diagnosed through physician interview) frequent tensiontype headache (control group only, selfreported or diagnosed through physician interview)
